game.name: National Class
game.description:
Racing can be great fun when you have the full controls of your chosen game! Today we have got you covered with a brand new online game where you have to control a lovely car on a fabulous racing track. Controls of this awesome online racing game are so simple and easy to understand that anyone can try it out! Your objective is to drive your vehicle at the high speed while avoiding other vehicles and obstacles along the way in National Class.

Drive as fast as you can to cover the long-distance in this HTML5 car game! Be attentive all the time as you will lose if you make too many mistakes! Luckily, you would have three chances to play through. Use your ever chance to stay for as long as possible to create the best score! The longer you stay the higher score you will make in this car driving simulator. Track your score at the top middle portion of the screen while the left bottom area will show your lives!

Remember your opponents are very clever and they will change the track anytime so do not take your fingers off the keyboard. Your car will keep running automatically and you have to only control its direction. So try to move it right or left timely to avoid any collision and create your new best score. Check out the full collection of our free racing games, find out a more suitable fun option and kill your boring hours without download! Do not bother about spending money as our all online games are free to play on multiple browsers and devices.
